title: Potato and shiitake mushroom gratin
ingredients: ['85g butter', '675g mushrooms, chopped', '675g fresh shiitake mushrooms, stemmed and coarsely chopped', '6 cloves garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons dried thyme', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary, crushed', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '500ml chicken stock', '1.3kg baking potatoes, scrubbed', '200g grated Parmesan cheese', '500ml double cream', '500ml single cream', '1 1/4 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper']
